name: Font Loader
description: Quickly and easily integrate web fonts from several different providers (Typekit, Google, Fontdeck, Fonts.com).

typekit.label: Typekit
typekit.info: Enter the Typekit Kit ID that you would like to load. You can find this ID within Typekits Kit Editor interface.

google.label: Google
google.info: Enter the names of the font families from the Google Font API that you would like to load. Separate by commas (e.g. Droid Sans,Droid Serif)

fontdeck.label: Fontdeck
fontdeck.info: Enter the ID of your website on Fontdeck. You can find this ID on the website page within your account settings.

fontscom.label: Fonts.com
fontscom.info: Enter the Project ID of your fonts collection on Fonts.com. You can find this Project ID in the Publish tab.
